mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_community_comment (POST_ID, USER_ID, PARENT_ID, COMMENT_DEPTH, CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{commentDepth}, #{content}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT tcc.COMMENT_ID AS commentId, tcc.POST_ID AS postId, tcc.USER_ID AS userId, tcc.PARENT_ID AS parentId, tcc.COMMENT_DEPTH AS commentDepth, tu.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, tcc.CONTENT, tcc.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, tcc.UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate, tcc.IS_DELETED AS deleted FROM tb_community_comment tcc JOIN tb_user tu ON tcc.USER_ID = tu.USER_ID WHERE tcc.POST_ID = #{postId} AND tcc.IS_DELETED = FALSE ORDER BY COALESCE(tcc.PARENT_ID, tcc.COMMENT_ID), tcc.CREATED_DATE ASC
SELECT USER_ID FROM tb_community_comment WHERE COMMENT_ID = #{commentId} AND IS_DELETED = FALSE
SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_ID) FROM tb_community_comment WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} AND tcc.IS_DELETED = FALSE
